title: Employers React to Workers Who Refuse a COVID-19 Vaccination
author: Allen Smith; J D; Lisa Nagele-Piazza; SHRM-SCP
description: Many businesses are reviewing and revising their COVID-19 vaccination policies as the coronavirus crisis continues—and employers may be asking what they can do if workers refuse to get the jab.
